grid.sql: SELECT $2 AS user_id, r.* FROM cur_rekv r WHERE r.status <> 3 AND r.id IN (SELECT rekv_id FROM get_asutuse_struktuur($1))

select.sql: SELECT 'REKV' as doc_type_id, $2::integer as userid, r.id, r.parentid, r.nimetus, r.aadress, r.email, r.faks, r.haldus, r.juht, r.kbmkood, r.muud, r.regkood, r.tel FROM ou.rekv r where id = $1
select.sqlAsNew: SELECT $1 :: INTEGER AS id, $2 :: INTEGER AS userid, 'REKV' AS doc_type_id, NULL :: INTEGER AS parentid, NULL :: VARCHAR(20) AS regkood, NULL :: VARCHAR(254) AS nimetus, NULL :: VARCHAR(20) AS kbmkood, NULL :: TEXT AS aadress, NULL :: TEXT AS haldus, NULL :: VARCHAR(254) AS tel, NULL :: VARCHAR(254) AS faks, NULL :: VARCHAR(254) AS email, NULL :: VARCHAR(254) AS juht, NULL :: VARCHAR(254) AS raama, NULL :: TEXT AS muud

select.sql: SELECT aa.* , kassa as kassapank FROM ou.Aa aa WHERE Aa.parentid = $1

deleteDoc.sql: select error_code, result, error_message from ou.sp_delete_rekv($1::integer, $2::integer)
